# Pacman Login Page
![Pacman](https://i.postimg.cc/vZT5Rb36/pacman-256x252.png)

Welcome to **Pacman Login Page**!

üéÆ A fun and engaging login interface designed with ![Pug](https://img.shields.io/badge/Pug-A86454?style=plastic&logo=pug&logoColor=white), ![Babel](https://img.shields.io/badge/Babel-F9DC3E?style=plastic&logo=babel&logoColor=black) , and ![Vue](https://img.shields.io/badge/Vue.js-35495E?style=plastic&logo=vuedotjs&logoColor=4FC08D).

This project includes enhancements for maintainability and is ready to be deployed on ![Vue](https://img.shields.io/badge/Vue.js-35495E?style=plastic&logo=vuedotjs&logoColor=4FC08D). 

## Features üåü

- **Pacman Login Experience**: Enter your credentials and watch the classic Pacman in action. If you fail to log in, a ghost will devour Pacman. If you succeed, Pacman will go after the ghost!
- **Enhanced Maintainability**: Refactored code for better readability and maintainability.
- **Deployment Ready**: Configured to be easily deployed on Vercel.
- **Future Integrations**: Roadmap to integrate with various authentication services like Supabase and Infisical.

## Getting Started üöÄ

Follow these steps to get the project up and running:

### Prerequisites

- **![NodeJS](https://img.shields.io/badge/node.js-6DA55F?style=plastic&logo=node.js&logoColor=white)**: Ensure you have the latest version of Node.js installed.
- **![Yarn](https://img.shields.io/badge/yarn-%232C8EBB.svg?style=plastic&logo=yarn&logoColor=white) or ![NPM](https://img.shields.io/badge/NPM-%23000000.svg?style=plastic&logo=npm&logoColor=white)**: Use your preferred package manager.

### Installation

Clone the repository and install dependencies:

```bash
git clone https://github.com/niscode/pacman-login.git
cd pacman-login
npm install
```

### Running the Project

To run the project locally:


```bash
npm start
```

Visit `http://localhost:8080` to see the Pacman Login Page in action.

### Deployment

Deploying to Vercel is a breeze:

1. Push your repository to GitHub.
2. Sign in to [Vercel](https://vercel.com).
3. Create a new project and import your GitHub repository.
4. Vercel will handle the deployment for you.

## Roadmap üõ£Ô∏è

- **Q2 2024**: Integration with Supabase for authentication.
- **Q3 2024**: Adding Infisical support for secure environment management.
- **Q4 2024**: Additional customization options for the login page.
